document_data.name: Malark Himbruel
document_data.titles: Wearer of the Purple, Archmage of the Purple
document_data.mainbody: '''Malark Himbruel''' was a [[wizard]] and a Wearer of the Purple of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He also held the rank of Archmage of the Purple. He was involved in the hunt for [[Shandril Shessair]].{{cite book/Villains' Lorebook|108-109}}{{cite book/Cult of the Dragon|33}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, Malark tried to capture Shandril in [[Shadowdale]] and he also wanted vengeance for the death of [[Symgharyl Maruel]], his underling. But he was ambushed and garrotted by the thief [[Torm (adventurer)|Torm]], who soon after slashed his throat, ending his threat.{{cite book/Spellfire/Paperback 1988|319-321|15}}
